Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Menstrual abnormalities ( 79 % ) , weight gain ( 60 % ) , muscle cramps / myalgias ( 40 % ) , and transaminase elevations ( 40 % ) were the most common adverse reactions .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Menstrual abnormalities |
| transaminase elevations |

In the given paragraph, the two disease entities are "Menstrual abnormalities" and "transaminase elevations". These are medical conditions mentioned in the text. The other mentioned issues, such as weight gain and muscle cramps/myalgias, while they may be symptoms of various diseases, are not diseases themselves and therefore are not included in the table.
